name: Ammo Drop
description:
I did a 15day challenge to make a game. I used a random game idea website. https://letsmakeagame.net/game-idea-generator/

Assets Used:

https://opengameart.org/content/freeart-topdown-extras

https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player

https://opengameart.org/content/top-down-animated-zombie-set

Ammo drop is a match 3 game. Where you are supplying ammo to soldiers that are holding off zombies. I dont play match 3 games at all so this was a learning experience.  There are many bugs but I have run out of time with this project. I will not be doing any updates. Thanks for playing.
